bio: Highly motivated software engineer with a solid understanding of JavaScript fundamentals, modern JS frameworks and libraries, and strong analytical skills with experience developing comprehensive data-processing logic.
Dedicated problem solver and skilled full-stack software engineer with a background in content development. Primary interests: user experience and natural language processing.

Builder of things. Hardware, software, you name it. Friendly, flexible software engineer with a deep understanding of the JavaScript language and full-stack web applications in modern frameworks and libraries, such as React with Redux, Angular, and Express.
Talented full-stack Javascript developer with a background in finance and accounting. Handy with a soldering iron and a true team player.
